alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Cortland; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 1:04PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Broome, southeastern Cortland, eastern Tioga and western Chenango Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 104 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Berkshire to near Union Center to Tioga Terrace. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Vestal, Johnson City, Endicott, Maine, Nanticoke, Coventry, Port Dickinson, Greene and Berkshire. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 4 and 9. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 67 North and 72. Interstate 88 between 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for central New York.
